title: Move by 8/8! apply today!
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Welcome to WaterView in Bremerton, Washington!
Set on a beautiful hilltop with panoramic views of the Puget Sound in the Sherman Heights neighborhood, this is “Just Right” Living™ at its finest.
A tranquil community just up the hill from the Sinclair Inlet & all of your daily needs, WaterView offers a prime location with breathtaking views where nature meets modern living.
Our spacious floor plans are designed with you in mind.
Enjoy our newly renovated luxury interiors with a ton of natural light, brand new finishes & a private patio or balcony for some fresh air from the Sound.
With 1, 2 and 3-bedroom options, you’ll find the home that’s “just right” for you!
The luxury continues with our community amenities, including a pool, fitness center, & clubhouse.
Add the beauty of Bremerton with “fast ferry” access to Seattle & you’ve got the “just right” lifestyle courtesy of WaterView.
We provide a passport to the very best of the Pacific Northwest, close to restaurants, shopping, public parks, & local employment – with everything just a quick drive away!
Embrace the local history, culture, natural surroundings & all that Washington has to offer.
Find your hilltop home at WaterView & rise to the lifestyle you deserve!
Tucked away in the heart of the Puget Sound, we offer a Pacific Northwest retreat with amenities to satisfy your every need & a lifestyle that’s “just right” for you.
Living at WaterView means making a home in a charming community managed by people who care.
Contact us today to schedule a tour & let us show you what “Just Right” Living™ is all about!
We look forward to hearing from you.
No aggressive breeds allowed.$50 Pet Rent/Month/Dog$35 Pet Rent/Month/Cat$250 Pet Deposit Per Pet $250 Non Refundable Pet Fee Per Pet
